# JTokenUtility.Clone&lt;T&gt; method

Clones the specified Json.NET token.

```csharp
public static T Clone<T>(T token)
    where T : JToken
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | The type of token. |
| token | The token. |

## Return Value

The clone.
